plot: In a dead and void dystopian world there is a place where no one exists anymore and everyone is just their own hallucination on the verge of disappearing.
title: Amnezijak na plazi

plot_en: In a dead and void dystopian world there is a place where no one exists anymore and everyone is just their own hallucination on the verge of disappearing.
